alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:12PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elko County through 600 PM PDT... At 511 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Carlin, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elko, Carlin, Lamoille, South Fork, Ryndon, Spring Creek, Adobe Summit and Lamoille Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A few cloud to ground lightning strikes are occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
